segments.content:
Mystika World Rules:
- Essence alignment affects all behavior and decisions
- Life essence promotes growth, healing, and creation
- Death essence involves endings, transformation, and cycles
- Order essence brings structure, law, and organization
- Chaos essence encourages change, freedom, and unpredictability
- Magic flows through the land and can be harnessed
- Ancient artifacts hold great power but require wisdom
- Balance between essences maintains world stability

World Mechanics:
- Skills use 0-100 scale (50 baseline)
- Relationships affected by essence alignment
- Time progresses in 60-tick bands
- NPCs respond to essence alignment
- World state changes through player actions
- Cooldowns prevent rapid repeated actions
